text: Anders Geert Jensen (was born 11 April 1961 in Aarhus) is a Danish Olympic Star class sailor. He finished eleventh in the 1988 Summer Olympics together with Mogens Just Mikkelsen.Anders Geert Jensen at Sports Reference ==References== Category:Olympic sailors of Denmark Category:Danish male sailors (sport) Category:Star class sailors Category:Sailors at the 1988 Summer Olympics – Star Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Aarhus
title: Anders Geert Jensen
